TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ScriptServiceAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ScriptServiceAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ScriptServiceAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指出 Web 服務可以從指令碼叫用。

span.span: Indicates that a Web service can be invoked from script.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要叫用 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 從 Web 服務方法時，您必須套用屬性相關的 Web 服務類別。To invoke a Web service method from ECMAScript (JavaScript), you must apply the attribute to the related Web service class. 當您將套用至 Web 服務類別定義，其中包含一或多個方法與套用，proxy 產生指令碼會建立對應至 Web 服務類別的 proxy 物件。When you apply to a Web service class definition that contains one or more methods with applied, the proxy generation script creates a proxy object that corresponds to the Web service class. 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何套用至 Web 服務，以便可以從用戶端指令碼呼叫其方法的類別定義。The following example demonstrates how to apply to the Web service class definition so that its methods can be called from client script.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
